backend/main.mo: Defines a canister storing sarees with CRUD-style queries for all items, offers, and new arrivals.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme variables and dark mode styles for the appâ€™s design system.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and app layout with bottom navigation.
frontend/src/appConfig.ts: Stores business configuration and provides a helper for generating WhatsApp order links.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with route-based highlighting.
frontend/src/components/LoadingGrid.tsx: Skeleton grid component shown while catalog data loads.
frontend/src/components/SareeCard.tsx: Displays saree info, badges, image, price, and WhatsApp order button with navigation to details.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppOrderBut: Button component that opens WhatsApp with a prefilled product message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using identity state, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSarees.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch saree lists, offers, new arrivals, and individual sarees via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, dark mode, typography, background pattern, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Catalog.tsx: Displays the full saree catalog with loading, error, and empty states using SareeCard components.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Renders contact options including WhatsApp, phone, and map links along with business info.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page with hero section, quick navigation shortcuts, welcome text, and footer.
frontend/src/pages/NewArrivals.tsx: Shows newly added sarees with loading, error, and empty states using SareeCard components.
frontend/src/pages/Offers.tsx: Lists sarees on special offer with handling for loading, errors, and empty results.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetails.tsx: Product details page that loads a saree by ID, shows its image, price, offer/new arrival tags, and provides a WhatsApp order button with loading and error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, container settings, and custom themes for the app.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, features, images, and architectural notes for the Suvarna Collection mobile app.
